Systems:

SCOURER

THERMAL LANCE

No description given.

FOCUS DOWN

When the Scourer hits with the Thermal Lance, targets take {5/7/8} Burn if they were also successfully hit with the Thermal Lance in the previous round.

COOLING MODULE

At the start of their turn, the Scourer clears all heat if they haven’t moved – including involuntary movement – since the end of their previous turn.

ABLATIVE SHIELDING

The Scourer has Resistance to Energy damage.

SUPERCHARGED

Characters affected by Focus Down are also Shredded and Slowed until the end of their next turn.

EMERGENCY VENT

When the Scourer exceeds their Heat Cap or becomes Stunned, they become Invisible until the start of their next turn.

MELT

The Scourer makes a ranged attack against an object, deployable or Drone within Range 10, dealing 20 AP Energy damage on a success.

PULSE LASER

At T2–3 this weapon can make two attacks at a time, targeting the same character or two different ones.

ULTRA

SHOCK AND AWE

The Ultra takes two separate turns each round. They regain spent reactions each time they take a turn.
If the Ultra is facing five or more hostile characters when combat begins, the Ultra takes a third turn each round.

DEADLY

The Ultra deals +1d6 damage on critical hits.

JUGGERNAUT

At the start of the Ultra’s turn, they clear one condition. At the end of their turn, they repair one destroyed weapon or system.

REINFORCED

The Ultra gains +3 Structure and +3 Stress.

LEGENDARY

The Ultra rolls all structure damage and overheating checks twice and chooses either result.

RESILIENT

The Ultra gains +5 HP.

REFLEX

The Ultra can Overwatch unlimited times per round.

FORTRESS

The Ultra gains +3 Accuracy on Systems saves, and tech attacks against them receive +3 difficulty.

LIMITLESS

The Ultra can Overcharge. Instead of the standard cost, they always gain 1d6 heat.

SHORT-CYCLE LANCE

Draw a line 30 path: characters within the affected area must succeed on an Agility save or take 1 structure damage. On a success, they are reduced to 1 HP. Objects smaller than Size 5 are completely annihilated.

REPULSION FIELD

When hostile characters start their turn adjacent to the Ultra or become adjacent to the Ultra for the first time on their turn, they take {2/4/6} Energy damage + 2 heat and must succeed on a Systems save or become Impaired until the end of their next turn.
